text: A Julia set is a fractal. It is a set defined given a rational function (written J(f)). The Fatou set of a rational function (F(f)) is the complementary set of the Julia set of f. The Fatou set of a function are the values such that all nearby values behave similarly when the function is repeatedly iterated. == Related pages == * Fractal * Mandelbrot set Category:Fractals
title: Julia set
